name: Between The Eyes
description:
Try to collect the most of bonuses without be touching by monsters...

But warning! each item set propreties of your weapon randomly.

The game was made in 10 hours, only by me for the Trijam 166.

The them was "Upgrad your weapons"

I hope you will enjoy 

Let a commentary with your advices.

For playing:

You must be use your mouse to aim for monsters en keep left click down to shoot.

Use too your directionals keys for move the player
